entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY AND COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
